English.Text: Nadasky reveals in his journal that, despite his best attempts to avoid it, the King sent a frigate — the HMS Ajax — to chase after the Santíssima Vitória in an attempt to retrieve the Sceptre of Capon. No good came from this command: La Corona's flagship was never seen again, and the Ajax's crew all lost their lives after being stranded on an island without fresh water for a week. Her Majesty believes that you may find more clues about the whereabouts of the flagship if you look into the fate of Richardson and his sailors.
